title: Nex-Gen V7 CF gravel wheels roll ultra-wide rims to lower price point
content:
One of the first major products out of last year’s industry-vet startup Nex-Gen Sports was their TeXtreme-based V7 gravel wheels. Featuring a broad, bold rim profile and Industry Nine hubs, they were an interesting entry to the market for sure (and one that we’ve been testing and liking since…full review coming soon). And at $1,699,

The post Nex-Gen V7 CF gravel wheels roll ultra-wide rims to lower price point appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
